subject: Athletics and Sports
Gifts
Black Friday and Cyber Monday (Shopping)
lead_paragraph: Send us your sports-related dream gift — the one thing in the sports world that would make you happier than anything else — and we’ll compile the best ones. Then, this weekend, you can read what other New York Times readers wished for.
